"Remember When" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Remember When" (feat. Ray J) [Intro/Pre-Chorus - Ray J] Do You Remember When (Remember When....) Do You Do You Remember When (Remember When....) [Chorus - Ray J] Do You Remember When I Met You Girl Everything Was Alllllllright Do You Remember when We Got A Room We Was Fucking Allllllll Night Do You Remember The Time Girl Like I Remember The Time Girl [Verse 1 - Gucci Mane] Girl You My Type You Just Right That Blouse Fit On You Just Right Them Jeans Shes Got On Skin Tight Shes Sexy Cool But Still Shy I'm Colder Than A Klondike Bipolar I Got Dumb Ice We Know Each Other We Go Together Like Hamburgers And Frech Fries Everythings All Right Well Never Have A fist Fight But Last Night We Had A Sex Fight I Told I Had A Blessed Night I'm Leaning I'm Meanin i Fall Asleep And I'm Dreamin Did The Club Bring My Teeth In? Last Night I Brang My Queen In I Go Get It You Push It If I Did It Right Then The Kid Did It??? You Hood Critters And You Hood Niggers Please Stay Out My Bizness From South France To South Philly ATL To North Memphis From My City To Your City You Think You Got More Swag But Not Really [Chorus - Ray J] Do You Remember When I Met You Girl Everything Was Alllllllright Do You Remember when We Got A Room We Was Fucking Allllllll Night Do You Remember The Time Girl Like I Remember The Time Girl [Verse 2 - Gucci Mane] Yo Yo Yo I'ma Put It Down So Gucci Mane Go And Cuff So Aronics Gonna Hurt But When I'm Gone Its Gonna Make You want More Scented Aura Candels I Pull Up In My Lambo The Bestest You Never Had Are The Bestest The Man Grow? You Had It But You Left So Thats Just The Game Go You Cant Get On My Level So Get Off My Land Hoe Met A Girl So ?? No Need To Win A Game On Reminicising Gucci Everytime They Play The Same Song I'm On Like A long John Short Skirt With No Thong On Sexy Naked Sunbathing Outside My House With Frames On I Took Off Some Busters? And That Boy Ain't Gonna Shit Bout it Its Alright We Can Tell That Sucka To Forget About it [Chorus - Ray J] Do You Remember When I Met You Girl Everything Was Alllllllright Do You Remember when We Got A Room We Was Fucking Allllllll Night Do You Remember The Time Girl Like I Remember The Time Girl [Bridge - Ray J] Girls To My Right Ladies To My Left Weathers So Hot Snows On My Chest When I See This Fly Girl Tried To Get Her Number Then She Tells Me I Already Smashed Last Summer Now High Club G5 Planes Remember Back Rubs And Pink Champagne Now High Club G5 Planes Remember Back Rubs And Pink Champagne [Chorus - Ray J] Do You Remember When I Met You Girl Everything Was Alllllllright Do You Remember when We Got A Room We Was Fucking Allllllll Night Do You Remember The Time Girl Like I Remember The Time Girl Do You Remember When (Remember When....)
